name: Ready to Publish Games | Windows iOS Android | No coding knowledge required
name_original: Ready to Publish Games | Windows iOS Android | No coding knowledge required
description:
This license is only for one user. Once purchased the listing will be removed Overview

Endless Loopers is an arcade with three infinite runners games. It consists of leaderboards and admob integration.

It is developed on Construct 3 game engine, which helps you to export the project to android, ios, window phone, windows desktop, mac and web. No coding knowledge required.

It has attractive graphics and sound effects. You can easily reskin the game.

You may try the game - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vundurty.ignition

Watch the gameplay -  

The download folder contains Construct 3 file, graphics and explanatory video

Graphics are provided along the source files, which help you to modify the assets as per your convenience. 

Post purchase, you will have complete rights to publish to any platform without any changes.

Features

Ready to publish code

Can be exported to iOS, Android, Web, Desktop and Windows phone

Bug free code

Construct 3 subscription license is required

How to Setup and Re-skinning

It's very easy to use, reskin and export

1. You will need to subscribe to Construct 3 (if you dont have one).

2. The is game completely ready to implement. You just need to replace the images with the dimensions from the project files.

3. Export the project to your preferred platform

4. The download folder contains Construct 3 file, graphics and explanatory video
